column5: Id like my reel to spin like it used to when i first bought it.  What products do you recommend for cleaning, what do i do?  Any tips?  ANy place in the GTA that cleans/fixes them?  I have a raven vectra SST.  Also interested in buying another, not new but used.  Anyone have one for sale?  Thanks
Take the bearings out, soak them in kerosene for a day or so, then dry them off then re-install..
you soak em that long bill?  All I ever give them is ten minutes and a couple spins...dry em out then a drop of sewing machine oil and youre good as new

Do the Vectra SST bearing just drop out?  What do you do with a reel that has pressed in bearings (ie:  my Stanton)?  I have heard that most times you damage the bearings trying to get them out, and need to install new ones...  I use Militec-1 as a lube, works great.....  Burt
watch the center pin maintenance videos on youtube, i used brake cleaner on my bearing and wow what a differance!!!
get some warm water going then add some shampoo...rinse it off ad ad some conditioner for a minute then rinse... wait thats my shower routine
clean bearing with lighter fluid  get some reel butter and put some on the bearing you are golden  put back together
